mapper.select: SELECT notice_no, title, DATE_FORMAT(fromDate, '%Y-%m-%d') AS fromDate FROM bc_notice WHERE notice_tp = '02' /* AND fromDate <= NOW() AND toDate >= NOW() */ ORDER BY notice_no DESC LIMIT #{page}, 10
SELECT count(*) FROM bc_notice WHERE notice_tp = '02' AND fromDate <= NOW();
SELECT title, contents, file_uid FROM bc_notice WHERE notice_no = #{notice_no}
